item.description:
Hike up from Bolton Rd. via Bolton pond tr to Balance Rock Tr. To Semuhenna To Harrington Tr.
Return down Old Indian tr. to Bolton Pond Tr to Parking Area.
Park along Bolton Pond Rd.
5 miles round trip 3-4 hours hiking time.
Steep sections but not many rocky areas.

The parking area is located on Bolton road about an 1/8th mile above the ski area entrance at the bottom of the mountain.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Mt. Wachusett: Bolton Pond/Balnce Rock/ Semuhenna Trails
